member.name: D2D1_FLOOD_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for properties of the Flood effect.

summary.para: The color and opacity of the bitmap. This property is a D2D1_VECTOR_4F. The individual values for each channel are of type FLOAT, unbounded and unitless. The effect doesn't modify the values for the channels.
The RGBA values for each channel range from 0 to 1.
